reviewtext: This is a well designed minimalist type case that I would love to use except that It doesn't quite fit my Nikon D80 with my favorite lens the 18-200 AF VR lens. It would work with any of the stock 18-55 or shorter lenses. The D40 works fine in this case too. It's well made, too bad it isn't a couple of inches longer!
summary: Nice Case, Doesn't Quit Fit Nikon D80 With 18-200 VR Lens
